description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
Enhancements
40580 - Shapes’ lines are incorrectly filed after converting to PDF
40588 - Macro disappeared after saving an XLSM file to XLS format
40589 - List box options overlap one another
40591 - Aspose.Cells corrupting XLSM file after calling the Workbook.Save() method
40621 - The component destroys properties of the workbook XML’s CalcPr node
40646 - You want to put a string longer than 32K
40659 - Smart Markers syntax for column index
40662 - Smart Markers - Nested Objects
 
Exceptions
40583 - GetNamedRanges() method throwing Unsupported function
40587 - Exception: Invalid IMEModeType string val
40590 - Exception while loading an XLSX Spreadsheet from SharePoint
40596 - GetNamedRanges() method throwing NullReferenceException
40614 - Exception while initializing with .xlsm input file
40618 - Fails to open a document with complex formula(s)
40635 - Exception on PivotTable’s RefreshData() method
40650 - Error found while creating a new SheetRender object
40653 - Exception while file was opening
 
Bugs
40438 - Disappearing chart title in the Pie charts
40446 - Chart to image conversion is not working properly 
40456 - Mismatches between Excel chart and the exported chart’s image
40459 - Problems with DataTable in charts when converting to image
40477 - Problem with DataTable in MS Excel charts
40550 - Differences in chart’s appearance between MS Excel and PDF
40575 - Converting Excel 97- 2003 to PDF
40577 - Aspose.Cells corrupting XLSM file after calling the Save twice
40582 - Bookmarks on one level issue
40592 - Aspose.Cells permanently hides ActiveX control on Save operation
40598 - Excel 2010 files with Pen data is getting corrupted
40599 - VLookup with an Indirect returns a “#REF” value
40606 - The Save call corrupts an XLSM file
40612 - Named ranges disappeared after Worksheet’s Copy
40615 - VLookup with an Indirect returns a “#REF” value - 2
40620 - Copied chart rotates the Display Unit Labels by 90 degrees
40622 - Calculation bug with a Workbook
40623 - Performing Subtotal Calculations on Grouped Column
40629 - The issues for PDF conversion regarding drawing shapes
40630 - Named Ranges issue
40632 - Aspose.Cells corrupting Excel files which contain Pivot Tables
40636 - XLSX to PDF conversion issues
40641 - Aspose.Cells handles Date value incorrectly
40649 - Get error while creating a new Workbook from the file
40651 - Named range does not grow horizontally with Smart Markers
40661 - Issue found in the relative XML file
40672 - Shape name changed after saving the XLSM file into new workbook
40674 - Bug with VLookup formula having wild cards (e.g. “*”)
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
